```{r}
miss_col <- apply(data,2,function(x) any(is.na(x)))
miss_col <- miss_col[miss_col]
miss_col
```
```{r}
data_complete=rnorm(1000,0,1)
df = data.frame(data_complete)
df$data_incomplete =df$data_complete
df$data_incomplete[df$data_incomplete>1] = NA
df$data_mean_impute = df$data_incomplete
df$data_mean_impute[is.na(df$data_mean_impute)] = mean(df$data_mean_impute, na.rm=TRUE)
```


```{r}
hist(df$data_complete, breaks = 50, xlim = range(-3,3), col = "lightgreen", main = "Complete data", xlab = "Complete data")
hist(df$data_incomplete, breaks = 50, xlim = range(-3,3), col = "lightblue", main = "Incomplete data", xlab = "Incomplete data")
hist(df$data_mean_impute, breaks = 50, xlim = range(-3,3), col = "pink", main = "Mean imputed data", xlab = "Mean imputed data")
```
